src:
Osvaldo Haay Kembali Bergabung dengan Timnas Indonesia U-23
05 Nov 2019, 02:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Winger Persebaya Surabaya, Osvaldo Haay kembali bergabung dengan timnas Indonesia U-23 setelah sempat dicoret karena cedera. Dia mengikuti pemusatan latihan untuk persiapan SEA Games 2019.
Kepastian bergabungnya Osvaldo Haay ke timnas disampaikan Aji Santoso, pelatih Persebaya. Setelah pemain asal Papua tersebut tak terlihat dalam latihan di Stadion Gelora Delta, Sidoarjo, Senin (4/11/2019) sore.
"Osvaldo (Haay) ke timnas," kata Aji Santoso menjelaskan penyebab mantan pemain Persipura tersebut tidak datang latihan.
Itu artinya, kemungkinan besar Osvaldo Haay bakal absen ketika Persebaya menghadapi PS Tira Persikabo, Sabtu (9/11/2019) mendatang. Laga tersebut akan dihelat di Stadion Pakansari, Cibinong.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Osvaldo Haay Joins the Indonesian U-23 national team again
05 Nov 2019, 02:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Winger Persebaya Surabaya, Osvaldo Haay rejoined the Indonesian U-23 national team after being dropped due to injury. He attended a training camp in preparation for the 2019 SEA Games.
The certainty of joining Osvaldo Haay to the national team was conveyed by Aji Santoso, coach of Persebaya. After the player from Papua was not seen in training at the Gelora Delta Stadium, Sidoarjo, Monday (11/04/2019) afternoon.
"Osvaldo (Haay) went to the national team," said Aji Santoso, explaining why the former Roma player did not come to training.
That means, most likely Osvaldo Haay will be absent when Persebaya faces PS Tira Persikabo, next Saturday (11/09/2019). The match will be held at Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
